about_the_game:
After a long escape with your dog from past natural disasters in your hometown, you find a place that resembles an old village. Night is falling, so the player has decided to sleep near an old house he found.

Plant fruits, process or sell them
Plant various fruits and vegetables to earn money. You can also process the fruit with the help of machines. Become the most popular fruit grower!

Keep Animals
Keep different animals and profit from their yields. In addition to pigs, cows and chickens, many extraordinary animals are waiting to find a home on your farm to support you!

Mining, exploring & fishing
Explore various caves and discover rare artefacts. Walking through the woods can also be rewarding. Or try your luck at fishing in the ponds, rivers and the sea.

Customize your Farm & House
Customise your farm and your house with various farmhouses, decorative items and machines. Let your creativity run wild.

Weather & Daycycle
There is variety due to changing weather and different times of day.

Complete quests
Help the people in the village by completing various quests or finding hidden Easter eggs, if there are any...

name: Growth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor/Ryzen 1700+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
